Content.Title: Removing and Adding Walls

Images.Alt: Gif of removing walls from a grid.
Gif of adding walls to an empty grid.

Text: Right-click a wall to remove it. You can also hold right-click and drag your mouse to remove multiple walls!
Left-click a wall slot to add a wall. You can also hold left-click and drag your mouse to add multiple walls!

Content.Title: Fill Tool

Images.Alt: Gif of Filling parts of a grid.

Text: Shift-click the first tile (Or start fill mode by clicking Edit->Fill and then click the first tile) then click the second tile (left for fill walls, right for remove walls) to fill the area between the two selected tiles.

Content.Title: Undo and Redo

Images.Alt: Gif of undoing and redoing changes in a grid.

Text: You can undo any change of tile, fill, change of entrance, change of exit, or resize(See Settings) by clicking Edit->Undo or pressing Ctrl+Z. You can also redo anything undone by clicking Edit->Redo or pressing Shift+Ctrl+Z or pressing Ctrl+Y.
